name: The Bugs World (Ludum Dare 38)
description:
The Bugs World is a primitive real time tactics game about bugs.

All three levels can be beaten but I suggest to read the controls before playing.

Controls

Mouse:
Hold the left mouse button to select bugs.
Click the right mouse button to send bugs to the clicked location.
Hold the right mouse button to drag the camera.
Keyboard:
Use WASD or the arrow keys to move the camera.
Press Q to select all bugs.
Press E to select only inactive bugs.


Ludum Dare entry
